name: WikimediaCommons.RandomPictures
comment:
A library for working with the WikimediaCommons API

@docs PictureResource, getUrl, getMaxUrl, getMaxSize, Url, fetchResources

aliases.name: PictureResource
aliases.comment: Main type of the library, a picture resource from WikiMedia Commons.

values.name: fetchResources
values.comment: Fetches a number of picture resources from the API.

values.name: getMaxSize
values.comment: Get the maximum size in which the resource is available.

values.name: getMaxUrl
values.comment: Get an `Url` from a `PictureResource` pointing to a picture in the largest possible size.

values.name: getUrl
values.comment: Get an `Url` from a `PictureResource` if the given width is valid.
